question: Let <katex>$(gof)(x)=sin~x$</katex> and <katex>$(fog)(x)=(sin\sqrt{x})^{2}$</katex>. Then
explanation: If <katex>$f(x)=\sin^2 x$</katex> and <katex>$g(x)=\sqrt{x}$</katex>, then <katex>$(fog)(x) = f(\sqrt{x}) = \sin^2\sqrt{x}$</katex> and <katex>$(gof)(x) = g(\sin^2 x) = \sqrt{\sin^2 x} = |\sin x|$</katex>. Assuming domain where <katex>$\sin x > 0$</katex>, this matches.
